thread.title: Microsoft unveils new Office for iPad features on Apple's stage - ComputerWorld
thread.title_full: Microsoft unveils new Office for iPad features on Apple's stage - ComputerWorld - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: ComputerWorld
title: Microsoft unveils new Office for iPad features on Apple's stage - ComputerWorld
text:
In a surprise move, Microsoft sent a pair of representatives to Apple's big event in San Francisco on Wednesday to demonstrate new features in Office for iOS that are tailored for the new iPad Pro. Kirk Koenigsbauer, Microsoft's corporate vice president of Office 365 client applications, came on stage at the Bill Graham Civic Auditorium to show new changes to the company's suite of apps for Apple's tablet, including the ability to draw freehand shapes on a Word or PowerPoint document, and then get them translated into shapes like arrows or circles.
 ComputerWorld.
